author: DANIEL ZELTER
subject: Re: 3rd TV series DVD box
body:
"Coming 5 July to Japan; as posted on AoD forum thread:
http://www.animeondvd.com/dcforum/DCForumID2/1378.html"

Great. Now people who like Lupin in a pink jacket will be satisfied. I'm 
guessing they're also the same people who like Macross 7, Gundam Wing, and 
Flame of Recca. :)
